text: Vasile Blaga (born 26 July 1956 in Petrileni) is a Romanian politician. He was a Speaker of the Upper Chamber of the Romanian Parliament, the Senate, a former Minister of Regional Development and Housing and twice former Minister of Administration and Internal Affairs. On 28 November 2011, Blaga was appointed President of the Senate of Romania. He was removed as President of the Senate on July 3, 2012. ==References== Category:Presidents of the Senate of Romania Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Vasile Blaga
